Name: MPI_THREAD_SINGLE
Description: MPI_THREAD_SINGLE represents a thread support level. It is used as part of the MPI_Init_thread initialisation. MPI_THREAD_SINGLE is the first level; it informs MPI that the application is single threaded. Other thread support levels are, in order, MPI_THREAD_FUNNELED, MPI_THREAD_SERIALIZED and MPI_THREAD_MULTIPLE.
